subtitle: Tender breasts of chicken served with a herby salad packed full of interesting flavour.

method.text: Place chicken fillets on a board and cover with cling film. Use the end of a rolling pin to gently beat chicken until it is 1 cm thick all over.
Brush griddle pan with a little oil, then heat until really hot. Add chicken and cook for 8-10 min turning once until charred on both sides. Set aside.
Brush griddle pan with a little  more oil, then heat until really hot. Add the apple slices and cook 2-3 min turning once until charred on both sides. Set aside.
Meanwhile cook beans in pan of boiling water for 3-4 min or until just tender. Drain, rinse in cold water and drain.
Tear lettuce into pieces and place in salad bowl. Add tomatoes, beans, onion and half the coriander leaves.
To make dressing: Finely chop remaining coriander and mix with remaining oil, lime rind and juice, honey. Season to taste.
Add chicken and apples to salad and toss, adding the dressing.

title: Chargrilled chicken and apple salad
